Content: That's if it is 50/50 split right though? If say there is 80% longs vs 20% short, the 30% shortfall here comes out of Bitmex as you are counter trading them essentially

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: There is loss taken by the house, thus the loss fund they have.
